channel.title: In-App Purchases on Dmytro's Blog

item.title: Implementing In-App Purchases to SwiftUI app using StoreKit 2
item.description: Introduction I was wondering how to add in-app purchases to my app. I chose non-consumable in-app purchase because you can pay one time for this item. Here are a few steps on how I did it. First Step Set up In-App Purchases for your app in App Store Connect account or add a .storekit configuration file and start from there. If you’ve already set up In-App Purchases in your account, you can sync the StoreKit config with that data.
